int get_array_input ( int  a[],
int  MAX_INPUTS,
int  MAX_VALID_VALUE 
)

Function get_array_input Takes an array and fills the array using user input. Uses an upper bound combined with special user input to signify end of entries.

Parameters:
a Array to fill with user input
MAX_INPUTS Maximum number of integers that this array can store
MAX_VALID_VALUE Maximum integer value of a particular input; values above this will be rejected
Returns:
The value of counter, which indicates successful function completion, and also tells the calling function how many valid inputs were recorded
